title: CHANDRA WICKRAMASINGHE SAYS YELLOW RAIN IS YOUNG RED RAIN BEFORE GROWTH
content: By Walter Jayawardhana Explaining the recent Polonnaruwa showers of yellow rain Dr. Chandra Wickramasinghe said it is part of the growth cycle of red rain. In an interview the scientist of the Buckingham Center of Astrobiology in UK said, “The Kerala rain also had the same changes of colour from red to yellow. In the…
